main event: An Air Force pilot flying at 38,000 ft observed a descending white ball of fire with a long white trail falling earthward, followed by streaking rod-like glowing objects or streamers. The object disappeared, and the report also includes observations by a B-29 pilot and passenger.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at a high altitude of 38,000 ft.
The pilot observed a white ball of fire with a long white trail falling earthward, followed by streaking rod-like glowing objects or streamers.
The report also includes observations by a B-29 pilot and passenger, adding to the credibility of the sighting.
The bright flash initially thought to be lightning, but an actual UFO was observed.
The report includes possible explanations such as 'Was Balloon' and 'Possibly Astronomical' but does not provide a definitive conclusion.
sighted object: Descending white ball of fire with long white trail, streaking rod-like glowing objects or streamers
witnesses: AF pilot, B-29 pilot, and passenger
